definition: day after day/for several days running
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Yad entrance mine market both showed a high consolidation positive trend.
sentences.chinese: 連日來進口礦市場皆呈現出高位盤整向上的趨勢。

sentences.english: Foreign - funded enterprises over the past few days have been close-out cigarettes on the deal.
sentences.chinese: 連日來外資企業已紛紛對香菸進行清倉處理。

sentences.english: Affected by the poor weather which has lasted for many weeks, lychee production in Doumen has decreased this year.
sentences.chinese: 受連日陰雨的影響，斗門荔枝今年的產量有所減少。

sentences.english: SERIES】A series of rainy days spoiled their vacation.
sentences.chinese: 連日的雨天，破壞了他們的假期。

sentences.english: Since the days of son for empathetic.
sentences.chinese: 談及兒子連日以來爲情所困。

sentences.english: The quake was the second to shake the Tokyo area in as many days.
sentences.chinese: 這場地震是連日來第二場發生在東京周邊的地震。

sentences.english: In recent days, Qiongshan City to take a major move to prefectural city Fengxiang Road correlation.
sentences.chinese: 連日來，瓊山市採取大動作，對府城鳳翔路進行整容。

sentences.english: Air Force days of the KMT held an emergency meeting to deploy air defense.
sentences.chinese: 國民黨空軍連日召開緊急會議，部署空防。

sentences.english: Sentiment was helped by signs of coordinated action to ease the global crisis.
sentences.chinese: 應對全球危機的一致行動緩解了連日以來的陰霾。

sentences.english: Asia's stock markets are calming down after days of heavy selling.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲股市經過連日股票拋售後星期四相對平穩。

sentences.english: Days of torrential rain in Prachuap County, Thailand, caused severe flooding.
sentences.chinese: 泰國巴蜀縣，連日豪雨淹水成災。

sentences.english: Heavy snowfall in provinces to the north had cut off parts of the busy railway line that starts in the city and ends in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 連日的暴雪已經切斷了繁忙的京廣鐵路線的部分路段。

sentences.english: But Haitians ravenous from days without nourishment say the food is not nearly enough.
sentences.chinese: 但對連日來缺乏營養的海地人說，食品遠遠不夠。

sentences.english: Consecutive rainy days reduce summer heat in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 連日陰雨，讓北京夏天的暑熱減去了幾分。

definition: one after another/in succession/one by one/continuously/diverse/in profusion/numerous and confused/pell-mell
to be related/to entail/to involve/joint (liability etc)
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
to start out on a trip/to dispatch troops
